item.title: Consultancy
item.description: Finland is home to some of the best universities in the world and Finnish higher education system has been consistently among the top few since 2001. Such highly competitive universities are also extremely selective in their admission process, and require additional effort from the prospective students to ensure the best chance of admittance. This is where our expert team of consultants can help you achieve your goal!

item.title: Review1
item.description: “Ms Shirajum is an excellent math tutor. She explains all the concepts constructively and breaks them down for better understanding. She is also willing to go over the concepts multiple times if I am having trouble understanding the problems at first. I definitely recommend her as a math tutor for everyone." -Ankita C., IB maths, International School of Helsinki

item.title: AskTutor
item.description: We want to transform the way tutoring is done. This is why, we offer customized tuition plan for students at a reasonable price. At present, we are offering tuition to middle school, high school and IB students (both SL and HL) in physics, chemistry, mathematics and biology. We also provide English language training for students aiming to take IELTS, GRE, TOEFL and LSAT tests for university admission.

item.title: Click here to see the infographics
Review2
item.description: “As a tutor you are excellent and co-operative and sincere. I give you 100 out of 100. Best wishes for you." -Afzal A., IELTS student, Dhaka

item.description: “I received my maths exam results and I got the extra point, so I will now graduate! so thank you so much for all your help." -Ella T., IB maths, Helsinki

item.title: Consultancy
item.description: Register and purchase Registration for consultancy is done by paying the initial registration fee. We highly recommend you to contact us prior paying the registration. If none of the proposed payment options are available in your region, please let us know, and we will inform you of alternative methods. blockquote { margin-left: 15%; margin-right: 15%; padding: 15px; background: #eceded; border-radius: 10px; } .payment{ text-align: center; } Pay registration fee 50€.

item.title: FAQ
item.description: About Heading Frequently Asked Questions Is IELTS required to apply in the Finnish universities? – Yes, Finnish universities require an overall band score of 6.5 for IELTS. All of them accept IELTS Academic test while some universities also accept IELTS Indicator test. However, IELTS General test is not accepted for university level studies. How much is the application fee to Finnish universities? – There is no application fee to the Finnish universities.
